movie.title: Scream Blacula Scream
movie.description_intro: After an aging voodoo priestess dies, her arrogant son Willis Daniel's believes he is next in line to lead. He is outraged when Lisa, his mother's adopted apprentice is chosen as the leader. Willis seeks revenge by reviving the African prince Blacula but soon finds that he cannot control him.
movie.description_full: After an aging voodoo priestess dies, her arrogant son Willis Daniel's believes he is next in line to lead. He is outraged when Lisa, his mother's adopted apprentice is chosen as the leader. Willis seeks revenge by reviving the African prince Blacula but soon finds that he cannot control him.

movies.title: Free Solo
movies.summary: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.
movies.description_full: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.

movies.title: So Much Love to Give
movies.summary: Fernando is a family man - equally committed to each of his two families. But one wrong turn brings them crashing together.
movies.description_full: Fernando is a family man - equally committed to each of his two families. But one wrong turn brings them crashing together.
movies.synopsis: Fernando is a family man - equally committed to each of his two families. But one wrong turn brings them crashing together.

movies.title: Batman: Mystery of the Batwoman
movies.summary: A ruthless destructive vigilante posing as Batwoman is wreaking havoc in Gotham City. While she sets her sights on thwarting Penguin's evil plans, Batman concentrates on discovering this mysterious imposter's true identity. But when she's captured by the vicious Bane, it falls upon the caped crusader to rescue her, defeat Bane and foil the Penguin's devious plot himself.
movies.description_full: A ruthless destructive vigilante posing as Batwoman is wreaking havoc in Gotham City. But when she's captured by the vicious Bane, it falls upon the caped crusader to rescue her, defeat Bane and foil the Penguin's devious plot himself.

movies.title: Mama
movies.summary: Jeffrey Desange, senior partner of an investment brokerage, has a breakdown after a financial collapse and kills several co-workers and his estranged wife and kidnaps his two young daughters, Victoria and Lily. When they're found five years later, they're taken in by their uncle (their father's twin brother) and his girlfriend. Macabre events soon make the new guardians suspect that a supernatural evil force named Mama has attached itself to the girls.
